[aiida.calculations]
crystal.parallel = aiida_crystal_dft.calculations.parallel:CrystalParallelCalculation
crystal.properties = aiida_crystal_dft.calculations.properties:PropertiesCalculation
crystal.serial = aiida_crystal_dft.calculations.serial:CrystalSerialCalculation

[aiida.cmdline.data]
crystal = aiida_crystal_dft.cli.basis:basis_set

[aiida.data]
crystal.basis = aiida_crystal_dft.data.basis:CrystalBasisData
crystal.basis_family = aiida_crystal_dft.data.basis_family:CrystalBasisFamilyData

[aiida.parsers]
crystal = aiida_crystal_dft.parsers.cry_pycrystal:CrystalParser
crystal.properties = aiida_crystal_dft.parsers.properties:PropertiesParser

[aiida.workflows]
crystal.base = aiida_crystal_dft.workflows.base:BaseCrystalWorkChain
